website_summaries.verdict: An effective vacuum wine preserver with an attractive stainless steel finish.
pros: Because this wine preserver is made of stainless steel, it will last longer than wine preservers made of plastic
It has an easy-to-use date marker that lets you know when you opened the bottle and it can keep wine fresh for up to a week
cons: Some complaints about stoppers not forming a complete vacuum seal

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set with the vacuum pump and the two sizes of bottle toppers. You can actually hear a lot of air escaping when you open bottle again if you want to have another glass of wine a few days later. So the wine stays good for a longer period of time that way because of the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Customer # 100

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: This literally fell to pieces on the first attempt to pump. The end of the pump came off on the first pull and the inner workings fell out and I wasn't able to get them back together again. I may have just gotten a lemon off the assembly line, but it definitely wasn't tested before it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: A Wine Saver That Works
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best wines savers that I've had so far. It has a dial on top to point to the day that you opened the bottle. And the top has a little release valve on it to relieve the suction. It also keeps the suction the entire time without escaping. This is a great wine saver.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy and works really well! I highly recommend. Watch the videoI posted. It will show you how well this works!
customer_reviews.author: If I’m being honest... 😎

customer_reviews.title: works okay
customer_reviews.text: The stoppers are good and hold negative pressure. The vaccum pump works fine but it is exhausting to pump on it. I wish there was an easier way to pump air out. Overall good and sturdy project. It does the job and could keep wine fresh for 3 days after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims to do. Use a very light touch on the bottle to the device to get it to perform the vacuum action properly. Had a battery powered device prior, the batteries did not last that long for the task at hand. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ssssnice

customer_reviews.title: A little awkward to use, but seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to tell when you've pumped enough and somewhat awkward to hold in place, but once I got the hang of it, I thought it was good. Keeps my wine fresh longer.
customer_reviews.author: SBG

customer_reviews.title: this works!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The first time we tried the vacuum pump we were hooked! We removed the stopper from the wine bottle and it sounded like we had opened a bottle of champagne!

customer_reviews.title: Nice investment, works great !
customer_reviews.text: This company has went above and beyond to make me a happy customer. Makes this product that much better. Thank you and well worth the investment.

customer_reviews.title: Makes your wine last for weeks!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed!! I had used this for the first time & didn’t end up drinking the rest of my wine for 3 1/2 weeks. I was gonna use the rest of the wine for cooking because I had assumed it had gone bad. I tasted it just to check because it smelled ok.. and the wine is still good! It’s cheap wine too! Very impressed!! I’m a big wino so I drink a lot of wine!

product_meta.title: EZBASICS Wine Saver Vacuum Pump with 2 Wine Stoppers, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver with 2 stoppers

The EZBASICS wine saver pumps oxygen out of an opened wine bottle and reseals it with a wine stopper. The sealing condition will slow down deterioration of wine, which will preserve the wine for up to 7 days. For a half-full wine bottle, it should take about 15-20 seconds of steady pumping to achieve a vacuum seal. When you want to taste the wine again, simply pull the center of the stopper to break the seal and remove it.



 

 

Contents:

1 Wine Stainless Steel Saver Pump

2 Wine Rubber Vacuum Stoppers

1 User Guide

 

 

 

How to use:

Setting the date indicator:

1. Use the symbol to indicate the date you last opened the bottle.

2. Gently swivel the metal ring to left or right until the symbol is above the correct date.

To Keep your wine fresh:

1. Insert the stopper plug into the neck of the wine bottle until it is firmly seated.

2. Connect the wine pump with the wine stopper. One hand firmly grip the top of the bottle and base of the pump to hold them in place.

3. Continue holding the bottle while moving the handle up and down until you feel resistance.

Removing the wine stopper:

1. Press the pin located in the center of the wine stopper towards the edge of the stopper to release the vacuum seal.

2. Continue to hold the bottle securely while easing the stopper upwards and out of the bottle.
feature_bullets: Keep Flavor for 1 Week: The wine preserver removes air from your wine bottle to keep flavor of wine for up to one week.
Durable and Stylish Design: The wine vacume pump is made of stainless steel which is more durable and long lasting than plastic savers.
Date Markers: The vacuum wine stoppers can record the time you last opened the bottle. You simply turn the ring on the stopper which can point to the time you want.
Great Gift for Wine Lover: This classy wine pump kit stylishly designed for personal use or as a tasteful gift for a wedding, holiday, anniversary, birthday, or for any wine lover.
Warranty: 12-Month limited Warranty and 100% Quality Satisfaction Guarantee. We will gladly address any inquiries you have and solve any issues that may arise.
